classification_data.text: RELACIÓN PRINCIPALES ACCIONISTAS De acuerdo con su solicitud, nos permitimos informar que la relación de nuestros principales accionistas se encuentra debidamente actualizada en la página web del Grupo. A continuación, relacionamos el link en el cual puede encontrarla: https://www.grupoexito.com.co/es/principales-accionistas La presente certificación se expide a los 01 días del mes de Febrero de 2024. Cualquier información adicional que requieran, no duden en contactarnos. Cordialmente, _________________________________________ Giovanny Humberto Velasquez Ruiz Apoderado Especial

content.thinking: Let me analyze the document content: ### Document Content Analysis: The document appears to be in Spanish and contains information about the principal shareholders (accionistas principales) of a company called "Grupo Éxito". It is a certification letter that informs the reader that the list of principal shareholders can be found on the company's website. Key elements in the document: 1. Title: "RELACIÓN PRINCIPALES ACCIONISTAS" (List of Principal Shareholders) 2. Statement that the list of principal shareholders is updated on the company's website 3. Link to the shareholders information: https://www.grupoexito.com.co/es/principales-accionistas 4. Date of certification: February 1, 2024 5. Signed by: Giovanny Humberto Velasquez Ruiz, Special Attorney (Apoderado Especial) 6. Grupo Éxito logo and company information ### Category Determination: Now I'll evaluate this document against the defined categories: 1. **BLANK**: Not applicable - the document has meaningful content. 2. **LINK_ONLY**: This is close, as the document primarily redirects to a website for the actual shareholder information. However, it has more context than just a link (official certification, signature, date, etc.). 3. **CECRL**: Not applicable - no personal identification document. 4. **RUT**: Not applicable - not a tax registration document, no DIAN involvement. 5. **CERL**: Not applicable - not a Chamber of Commerce certificate of existence. 6. **ACC**: This is related to shareholders ("accionistas"), but doesn't actually contain the ownership structure with percentages or shares. It's a letter redirecting to where that information can be found, not the ACC document itself. 7. **RUB**: Not applicable - not a beneficial ownership report. 8. **POR_REVISAR**: This might apply since it's related to shareholder information (ACC-adjacent) but isn't the actual shareholding structure document. Looking closer at the LINK_ONLY category: "**Definition**: Documents whose primary content consists of hyperlinks/URLs directing to external sources for the actual information" This document fits this definition as its primary purpose is to inform that the shareholder information is available at a specific URL. The document itself doesn't contain the actual shareholder structure, just directs to where it can be found. It includes minimal explanatory text beyond this redirection function. The document matches the example pattern: "información disponible en:" followed by a URL. Even though there's a formal certification structure with a date and signature, the substantive content is primarily directing the reader to a link for the actual shareholder information. Therefore, LINK_ONLY appears to be the most appropriate classification for this document. Let me extract the complete text for the JSON response: ``` RELACIÓN PRINCIPALES ACCIONISTAS De acuerdo con su solicitud, nos permitimos informar que la relación de nuestros principales accionistas se encuentra debidamente actualizada en la página web del Grupo. A continuación, relacionamos el link en el cual puede encontrarla: https://www.grupoexito.com.co/es/principales-accionistas La presente certificación se expide a los 01 días del mes de Febrero de 2024. Cualquier información adicional que requieran, no duden en contactarnos. Cordialmente, _________________________________________ Giovanny Humberto Velasquez Ruiz Apoderado Especial ```
